sentences.english: Under these conditions, ethnic family patterns were slowly broken down by an increasingly urbanized, industrialized environment.

sentences.english: At present, China has entered the industrialization in the late stage in the heavy chemical industry.

sentences.english: The result of these trends is the rapid deindustrialization of Britain.

sentences.english: We also realized the growing need and necessity to industrialize certain sectors of the economy.

sentences.english: We are now living in a highly industrialized world.

sentences.english: The analytical basis of the discussions was China's postwar industrialization.

sentences.english: New style industrialization and urbanization are twins in the process of modernization.

sentences.english: The western city was a highly industrialized area.

sentences.english: Sony also introduces the industry's first male sexbot, Kake.

sentences.english: The city is highly industrialized and has a large shrimp-fishing fleet. Population, 257, 453.
